meanings.sent1: She had the nutsiest idea to jump off the swing at its highest point.
meanings.sent2: The haunted house was the nutsiest place she had ever visited.
meanings.sent3: His nutsiest dance moves always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The nutsiest roller coaster in the amusement park made her scream with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The nutsiest character in the movie was the one who talked to animals.

meanings.definition: The most extreme or outrageous in behavior or actions
meanings.sent1: The nutsiest in the group always came up with wild plans.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the nutsiest in the office for his daring stunts.
meanings.sent3: The nutsiest of all the desserts was the giant ice cream sundae.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to quit her job and travel the world was the nutsiest of them all.
meanings.sent5: The nutsiest of the competitors was the one who attempted the most dangerous stunts.
